title: new champion suggestion zoidberg the saltwater squid
body:
hi,  heres my champion suggestion 

q- futurama express - sends a ship that deals 1000 true damage 100 second cooldown

w- squid patrol- sends  a squid to steal baron  30 second cooldown

e- rebirth-  turns zoidberg into an egg and gives him 3000 gold 1000 second cooldown

r- squidward - summons a fish to eat flakes then that fish fires jinx and ashe and ez and draven ulti at 1 selected target also gives tf vision ultimate 

lore:  Accidentally frozen, pizza-deliverer Fry wakes up 1,000 years in the future. He is taken in by his sole descendant, an elderly and addled scientist who owns a small cargo delivery service. Among the other crew members are Capt. Leela, accountant Hermes, intern Amy, obnoxious robot Bender and lobster

replies.body:
hi, this champion concept is 10/10 but i think there are balance issues
for example mr crabs cannot kill an uting tryndamere who is in kayle ult
his ult needs to be able to go through that for balance
hi, thank you for your feedback i will contact riot and get them to fix it asap
